ModMetaData.name: Outland - Motz Coalition
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
ModMetaData.description: Expansion module for Outland, adding a new faction of moth-like humanoids that abhor light and prefer the dark. They come with their own weapons and apparel as well as the ability to fly short distances. If loaded alongside Subsanna Depths, the faction will prefer to spawn in the Subsanna biomes.
